CustomField.formula: IF(Case_Role__r.Entity__r.IsPersonAccount, IF(!ISBLANK(Case_Role__r.Entity__r.MiddleName), Case_Role__r.Entity__r.FirstName & " " & Case_Role__r.Entity__r.MiddleName & " " & Case_Role__r.Entity__r.LastName, Case_Role__r.Entity__r.FirstName & " " & Case_Role__r.Entity__r.LastName), Case_Role__r.Entity__r.Name)
CustomField.label: Name of Attendee
